title: Mr. Famous
description: When a couple of box-office bombs leads to a dramatic downturn in his career, an aging action star embarks on a journey of self-discovery and self-invention in the hope of getting in touch with his sensitive side and re-creating himself as a serious actor, in a hilarious look at the wild and wacky world of Hollywood. By the author of The Cigarette Girl. Reprint.
author: Carol Wolper
